item.title: How to easily generate a perfectly normal distribution
item.description: Many times, for instance when teaching, I needed to quickly and simply generate a perfectly normally distributed sample to illustrate or show some of its characteristics. This is now very easy to do with the new bayestestR package, which includes the rnorm_perfect function.
